title: Mobile Microlearning Based on Adaptive Hypermedia Design Patterns

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and ability to use mobile devices
context.additional_context: Scientific microlearning course applying pattern-based adaptive hypermedia design principles in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify basic hypermedia structure patterns for science content exploration with 80% accuracy.
Learners can design three or more adaptive interface variations based on learner types (visual/auditory/kinesthetic).
Learners can implement a prototype hypermedia application for science education within 90 minutes using the APHID methodology.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
